headline.main: Army Fight on Prejudice In North Africa Praised

lead_paragraph: Education of soldiers of the United States Army to respect the customs of Moslems in North Africa was commended in a sermon yesterday morning at the Congregational Church-in-the-Gardens, Ascan Avenue and Greenway North, Forest Hills, Queens, by the Rev. Franklin P. Cole.
